name: Escape from Planet of Phylom
overview: Somewhere in time and space, you found yourself stuck on the planet Phylom. You have been taken prisoner by the Phyloms - a hostile group of aliens. After managing to escape from your cell, you find you starship and set off to voyage through Phylom and try to escape from the strange planet. Blast your way through every single sector if you can, but the Phyloms are out to stop you from your escapades.
